meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the June 26, 2024 City Council Meeting
An ordinance amending Sections 2-43, 2-44, and 2-49 of Chapter 2, 'Administration'
agenda_items.description: (1) changing the name of the Department of Building Services to Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management; (2) assigning real estate services from the Department of Public Works to the Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management; (3) providing a saving clause; providing a severability clause; and providing an effective date.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32554
agenda_items.description: authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2023-24 for the maintenance and operation of various departments and activities.

agenda_items.title: Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Patricia Ann Dunagan-Baylor A/N/F minor K.G. v. City of Dallas
Authorize payment of the property damage claims filed by Daniel Gowan and Travelers Insurance
Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Spencer Fane LLP
agenda_items.description: for additional legal services to the City of Dallas in connection with the lawsuit styled LaToya K. Porter v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: A resolution approving notes issued pursuant to a commercial paper program to finance improvements at Dallas Love Field
A resolution authorizing the execution of the Financing Agreement and related documents for the funding commitment from the Texas Water Development Board
Authorize amendments to Ordinance No. 31668
agenda_items.description: authorizing the City of Dallas General Obligation Commercial Paper Program.

agenda_items.title: A resolution amending the Code of Rules and Regulations of the Civil Service Board
agenda_items.description: (1) broadening the entry-level hiring requirements for Dallas Fire-Rescue positions of Fire-Rescue Officer Trainee and Fire Prevention Officer Trainee.

financial_items.description: Not to exceed $4,108,213,070 for various departments and activities.
Not to exceed $60,000 for partial settlement of lawsuit.
Total not to exceed $31,100.55 for property damage claims.
Not to exceed $60,000 for additional legal services.
Not to exceed $4,273,853.00 for improvements at Dallas Love Field.
